<html><body><div><div class="xvlfx ZRifP TKoO eaKKC EcdEg bOdfO qXhdi NFNeu UyHES " data-testid="prism-article-body"><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao MvWXB TjIXL aGjvy ebVHC "><span class="oyrPY qlwaB AGxeB  ">ELSMERE, Del.  -- </span>The first husband of former first lady Jill Biden has been charged with killing his wife at their Elsmere, Delaware home in late December, authorities announced in a news release Tuesday.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">William Stevenson, 77, was married to Jill Biden from 1970 to 1975.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Caroline Harrison, the Delaware Attorney General's spokesperson, confirmed in a phone call that Stevenson is the former husband of Jill Biden.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Jill Biden declined to comment, according to an emailed response from a spokesperson at the former president and first lady's office.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Stevenson remains in jail after failing to post $500,000 bail after his arrest Monday on first-degree murder charges. He is charged with killing Linda Stevenson, 64, on Dec. 28.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><div class="oLzSq QrHMO fnRUo pvsTF EhJPu vPlOC zNYgW OsTsW RMeqy daRVX ISNQ sKyCY eRftA acPPc MENS nFwaT MCnQE mEeeY SmBjI xegrY rPLsU iulOd NIuqO zzscu lzDCc aHUBM IEgzD OjMNy eQqcx SVqKB GQmdz jaoD VWDdR ONJdw vrZxD OnRTz gbbfF roDbV GPGwb oMlSS gfNzt oJhud eXZcf zhVlX "><div><div class="InlineImage GpQCA lZur asrEW " data-testid="prism-inline-image"><figure class="kzIjN GNmeK pYrtp dSqFO " data-testid="prism-figure"><a class="zZygg UbGlr iFzkS qdXbA hsDdd DbOXS oklLN GpWVU iJYzE " data-testid="prism-linkbase"><img alt="Linda Stevenson" class="hsDdd NDJZt sJeUN IJwXl vBqtr KrDt itslR WAUrb hakZw HlUVI " data-testid="prism-image" draggable="false" src="https://cdn.abcotvs.com/dip/images/18536144_020326-wpvi-linda-stevenson-img.png"></a><figcaption><div class="nMMea bNYiy Mjgpa dGwha DDmxa jgKNG RGHCC aBIU PriDW lZur " data-testid="prism-caption"><p class="HXPPJ barbu yKsXL IzgMt VcHIt uhSzI YGNMU cRAsZ xqMcl QtRul "><span class="hsDdd OOSI GpQCA lZur VlFaz " data-testid="prism-truncate"><span><span class="gtOSm FbbUW tUtYa vOCwz EQwFq yCufu eEak Qmvg nyTIa SRXVc vzLa jgBfc WXDas CiUCW kqbG zrdEG txGfn ygKVe BbezD UOtxr CVfpq xijV soGRS XgdC sEIlf daWqJ ">Linda Stevenson</span></span></span></p><p class="qinlA IpWvx oqZz tylGM lyWxS nWcVF UhTug PPcLh YxlyB "><span class="gtOSm FbbUW tUtYa vOCwz EQwFq yCufu eEak Qmvg nyTIa SRXVc vzLa jgBfc WXDas CiUCW kqbG zrdEG txGfn ygKVe BbezD UOtxr CVfpq xijV soGRS XgdC sEIlf daWqJ YNujN JGtjI aZFDu rkKLh ">DelawareFuneral.com</span></p></div></figcaption></figure></div></div></div><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Police were called to the Elsmere home for a reported domestic dispute after 11 p.m. and found a woman unresponsive in the living room, according to a prior news release.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Life-saving measures were unsuccessful.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">She ran a bookkeeping business and was described as a family-oriented mother and grandmother and a Philadelphia Eagles fan, according to her obituary, which does not mention her husband.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Stevenson was charged in a grand jury indictment after a weekslong investigation by detectives in the Delaware Department of Justice.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">It was not immediately clear if Stevenson has a lawyer. He founded a popular music venue in Newark called the Stone Balloon in the early 1970s.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC eTIW sUzSN ">Jill Biden married U.S. Sen. Joe Biden in 1977. He served as U.S. president from January 2021 to January 2025.</p></div><p class="uvrxY zOGtW ">Copyright Â© 2026 by The Associated Press. All Rights Reserved.</p></div></body></html>
